name: GMC Token
description: Gold Mining Co Token - Revolutionary blockchain-based gold mining ecosystem. The token that is worth gold! GMC represents real gold production with up to 5% profitability based on physical gold mining operations. Features include gold-backed staking, affiliate rewards system, transparent mining operations, and decentralized finance capabilities. Each token is backed by real gold mining activities with full blockchain traceability and security.

attributes.value: Up to 5% based on real gold production
